simulation_type_t1d.title: Type of simulation to run
simulation_type_t1d.description: Complication costs and disutilities are also included in PSA.

simulation_type_t2d.title: Type of simulation to run
simulation_type_t2d.description: Complication costs and disutilities are also included in PSA.

simulation_type_pre.title: Type of simulation to run
simulation_type_pre.description: Complication costs and disutilities are also included in PSA.

iterations_t1d.title: Number of iterations
iterations_t1d.description: In 'Standard', this is the number of times a simulation is run. In 'Sensitivity analysis', this is the number of times a new set of values is drawn.

iterations_t2d.title: Number of iterations
iterations_t2d.description: In 'Standard', this is the number of times a simulation is run. In 'Sensitivity analysis', this is the number of times a new set of values is drawn.

iterations_pre.title: Number of iterations
iterations_pre.description: In 'Standard', this is the number of times a simulation is run. In 'Sensitivity analysis', this is the number of times a new set of values is drawn.

seed_t1d.title: Simulation Seed
seed_t1d.description: seed value can be anything between 1 and 9999

seed_t2d.title: Simulation Seed
seed_t2d.description: seed value can be anything between 1 and 9999

seed_pre.title: Simulation Seed
seed_pre.description: seed value can be anything between 1 and 9999

size_t1d.title: Number of individuals in the population

size_t2d.title: Number of individuals in the population

size_pre.title: Number of individuals in the population

time_horizon_t1d.title: Time horizon execution strategy
time_horizon_t1d.description: 'Fixed' runs for a set duration. 'Max age' runs until the youngest individual reaches the max age. 'All deceased' runs until all agents have passed away.
enumNames: All deceased (this will take a long time to run)

time_horizon_t2d.title: Time horizon execution strategy
time_horizon_t2d.description: 'Fixed' runs for a set duration. 'Max age' runs until the youngest individual reaches the max age. 'All deceased' runs until all agents have passed away.
enumNames: All deceased (this will take a long time to run)

time_horizon_pre.title: Time horizon execution strategy
time_horizon_pre.description: 'Fixed' runs for a set duration. 'Max age' runs until the youngest individual reaches the max age. 'All deceased' runs until all agents have passed away.

lifestyle_control_intervention_pre.title: Lifestyle intervention
lifestyle_control_intervention_pre.description: The lifestyle intervention is only applied to people with A1c in the prediabetes range (5.7-6.4%) and BMI>=25 and FPG in the prediabetes range (100-125 mg/dl). To change these criteria, use advanced intervention by selecting it from the dropdown menu above.

bmi_change_text.title: Percent change in BMI relative to baseline (Enter percentage changes as a fraction, e.g. enter –0.05 for a 5% reduction)

Apply to persons with HbA1 between.title: Apply to persons with HbA1c (%) between

Apply to persons with FPG between.title: Apply to persons with FPG (mg/dL) between

Percent change in BMI relative to baseli.title: Percent change in BMI relative to baseline (Enter percentage changes as a fraction, e.g. enter -0.05 for a 5% reduction.)

header_buttons.common_text: Modify effects on annual probability of diabetes onset

enumNames: Instead of using the BMI changes entered above, calculate the reduction in onset risk directly according to relative risk reductions entered below.

text_1.title: If percentage reduction in onset risk is calculated directly, the following values will be used (Enter percentage reductions as a positive fraction, e.g., enter 0.40 for a 40% reduction):
